name: Weapon Versatility
description: You can use your favored weapons in unconventional ways.
benefit: When wielding a weapon with which you have Weapon Focus, you can shift your grip as a swift action so that your weapon deals bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage instead of the damage type normally dealt by that weapon.
